WorkItem.ClosedComment: The fix should be visible in the upcoming release. Thanks!
WorkItem.Description:
It seems that there are some layout problems on the new project properties page of TypeScript 0.9.5. Text in the following controls is cut partially off:
-All section headers.
-Drop down menu text for choosing ECMA script version.
-"Combine JavaScript output" label.
-"Redirect JavaScript output" label.
-"Specify root directory of sou..." label.
-"Speciy root directory of Typ..." label.

I am experiencing the problem on a Surface Pro. First I thought it had something to do with display scaling (high resolution on small display), but it was the same when I turned it down.

I have attached a screenshot of the project properties page illustrating the problem.
WorkItem.Summary: Descriptions are cut off on project properties page in TypeScript 0.9.5

Comments.Message:
I'm not seeing this on a PC running Windows 8.1 on either of two screens running at 1280 x 1024
and 1920 x 1080.

Thanks for the screen shot.  Are you running any other customized settings that may have an impact (e.g. "make text bigger")?  We'll take a look under a variety of configurations/devices to see if we can locate the cause.
